content: these socks were designed out of my insatiable need for a new design to knit i often find myself knitting the same patterns and digging myself into a rut it s funny how something a little out of the ordinary can shift your perspective and give you a new appreciation for all the little details you didn t notice before now i will share my perception with you these socks are worked cuff down with a modified corrugated ribbing for the cuff the colourwork pattern is deceptively simple and is intentionally designed to have small floats to minimize the need to catch them in the back a german short row heel and wedge toe are all that s left and these will be done before you know it sizes s l materials * two contrasting colours of sock yarn approximately 60g of the main color and 30g of the contrast color * 2 25 mm us 1 dpns long circular needles for magic loop or 9 inch circular needle * stitch markers * tapestry needle
